story: Seagard was the place where the Robert Baratheon,King of House Martellused to live. Robert Baratheon was also known around Seagard as a great vigilante . Robert Baratheon really cared about  peace. It was the Middle Of the Night in The Ruby Ford  when  Eddard Stark threatened the  peace of Robert Baratheon
